pullrequest.title: Fix Issue 2239: All links teleport to origin if model has a revolute2 joint.

content.raw: I think these checks for the body pointer are here in case the parent or child link is the world, but I'm pretty sure there's multiple reasons that hinge2 doesn't support connecting to the world, so it's not a huge problem to see it go; I'm just checking the reason
content.html: I think these checks for the body pointer are here in case the parent or child link is the world, but I'm pretty sure there's multiple reasons that hinge2 doesn't support connecting to the world, so it's not a huge problem to see it go; I'm just checking the reason
